script:
1). Why would you want to transfer to Asia?
I didn't want to.
I wouldn't if I were you.
I think it would be exciting there. 
2). What about the weekly sales report?
Oh yeah. I'll do it tomorrow. 
The resort is lovely.
Because it's too late now.
3). Didn't you say you had to go to the airport?
I did have to go.
I did, but now I don't have to. 
I didn't have to say that.
